claim: The post that received the highest‑score comment is titled "Detecting a given face in a database of facial images".
extra_info: highest score comment refers to Max(comments.Score)
reasoning: The highest-score comment has a score of 90 and is on PostId 7224, whose title is exactly 'Detecting a given face in a database of facial images', matching the claim.

content.text: I'll verify this claim by exploring the database schema and then querying for the highest-score comment and its associated post title.

comments     postLinks    tags         votes

tool_use_result.stdout:
badges       postHistory  posts        users      
comments     postLinks    tags         votes

content.content:
CREATE TABLE comments
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    PostId          INTEGER          null,
    Score           INTEGER          null,
    Text            TEXT     null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    UserId          INTEGER          null,
    UserDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE comments
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    PostId          INTEGER          null,
    Score           INTEGER          null,
    Text            TEXT     null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    UserId          INTEGER          null,
    UserDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text: Now let me find the post associated with the highest-score comment. Since comments can be on answers (which have a ParentId pointing to the question), I need to consider that the "post" could be either the direct post or the parent question. Let me query both ways:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT c.Score, c.PostId, p.Title, p.ParentId FROM comments c JOIN posts p ON c.PostId = p.Id ORDER BY c.Score DESC LIMIT 5;"
input.description: Find the highest-score comment and its post title

content.content:

40|93592|Help me calculate how many people will come to my wedding! Can I attribute a percentage to each person and add them?|
